item.description: The Heart Aphorisms are the core of Alamism. Everything else stems from these. The Heart Definition defines the very core concepts, and the Heart Observation implies the core Alamist thought.

Aphorism Artists have the most arduous task of painting infinity. ^aphorism Commentary The meta aphorism sheds light on all aphorisms. It indicates that the meanings behind the words of aphorisms are infinite, and the words themselves are constraints.
Balance The one who stayed indoors and the one who caught every fish starved, but the fisherman who caught a meal for his family died of old age.
